title: Kudoki - Shinyaku Kabukie Maki
original_name: クドキ 新訳歌舞伎絵巻
sinopse:
Collection of one shots.

-   Yuki to Kiku
    Kiku, whose father has been executed for theft, is taken in by the sympathetic Lord and Lady Aoyama. Though Kiku wishes to live a "proper" life, she is accused of stealing the one thing that Lady Aoyama treasures the most...
